io.github.zachohara.pictographer.core

Class Polynomial.Term

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.zachohara.pictographer.core.Polynomial.Term
  • Enclosing class:
    Polynomial

    private static class Polynomial.Term
extends java.lang.Object
    A Term object represents a single term of a polynomial function. A Term contains a coefficient and an exponent.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      (package private) double coefficient
      The coefficient of this term.
      (package private) double exponent
      The exponent of this term.

      • valueAtX

        public double valueAtX(double x)
        Calculates the y-value of this polynomial function at the given x-coordinate.
        Parameters:
        x - the x-coordinate to calculate a y-value for.
        Returns:
        the y-value at the given x-value.

      • getLatex

        @Deprecated
public java.lang.String getLatex()
        Deprecated. 
        Builds a string that contains the source code for representing this term in a LaTeX engine.This method assumes that the coefficient for this term is a fraction with a numerator of 1, and that the exponent is an integer. If this is not true for this term, the method will return an incorrect result. The method is deprecated for this reason.
        Returns:
        the LaTeX source for this polynomial.

      • derivative

        public Polynomial.Term derivative()
        Calculates the derivative for this term, and returns it as another Term object.
        Returns:
        the derivative for this term.
